autoencoder examples
===================
Each example has a block of code for training and a block of code for testing. These should be run as separate scripts.

   :maxdepth: 2
   :caption: Contents:

   ex_ae_basic_train
   ex_ae_adv_train
   ex_ae_sid_train
   ex_ae_cnn_train
